001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
009
010public class ObjectiveGradientEstimator<N extends Number> {
011
012    public Vector<N> determineGradient(DataSet.Sample<N> sample, TrainableFunction<N> estimationFunction, ObjectiveFunction<N> objectiveFunction) {
013        Array<N> estimated = estimationFunction.estimate(sample.features());
014        Array<N> target = sample.targetOutputs();
015        Array<N> gradients = objectiveFunction.calculateGradient_dJ_da(1, estimated, target);
016        return new TypedVector<>(gradients, true, estimationFunction.getNumberTypeSupport());
017    }
018
019}
